Sentencas: This paper presents some application studies of the dynamic solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC model developed by the authors and reported in C. Wang and M. H. Nehrir, A physically-based dynamic model for solid oxide fuel cells, IEEE Trans.
Titulo: Short-time overloading capability and distributed generation applications of solid oxide-fuel cells
Short-time overloading capability and distributed generation applications of solid oxide-fuel cells

Sentencas: First, the model is used to investigate the short-time overloading capability of the SOFC.
Titulo: Short-time overloading capability and distributed generation applications of solid oxide-fuel cells

Sentencas: Then, the application of the model in distributed generation (DG) system studies is explored.
Titulo: Short-time overloading capability and distributed generation applications of solid oxide-fuel cells

Sentencas: Controller design methodologies are also presented for grid-connected SOFC DG power conditioning units to control power flow from the SOFC DG to the utility grid.
Titulo: Short-time overloading capability and distributed generation applications of solid oxide-fuel cells

Sentencas: Simulation results show that the SOFC DG system is able to manage real and reactive power flows to the utility grid to which it is connected.
Titulo: Short-time overloading capability and distributed generation applications of solid oxide-fuel cells

Sentencas: They also show that a properly designed SOFC DG can remain stable under temporary electrical faults.
Titulo: Short-time overloading capability and distributed generation applications of solid oxide-fuel cells
